name: Left List is Victorious
description: The moderate left of Dutch politics has won the recent elections, granting them the initiative and political capital needed to form a new government.

name: SDAP-RSAP Coalition
description: The more centrist social democrats have formed a coalition with the radical socialists in order to be able to put their views into effect in full.

name: Use the Popular Mandate
description: The people have given us their trust to repair the nation. With them having been granted their wish, we should work within the system to reform it.

name: Overthrow the System!
description: The parliamentary system of the Netherlands is obsolete! Let us abolish the current system in favour of a more radical solution.

name: Revoke the Ambtenarenverbod
description: The Ambtenarenverbod was a flawed attempt by Colijn to stop the rise of syndicalism in the Netherlands. With a serious left-wing coalition in power, it is time for us to repeal this obsolete mess!

name: Institute a Minimum Wage
description: Many people are currently working for less than they need for survival. Let us implement a general minimum wage that provides a safety net to those most in need...

name: Ban the VNH
description: The VNH is a highly polarising force within Dutch politics. The country is better off without their corrosive influence.

name: Disperse the Far-Right
description: Through our measures the far right has been virtually expunged from our nation. It will take years for them to become a significant force again even if we were to stop now! All the same, we must keep up the relentless pressure.

name: Democratic Collectivisation
description: Let us collectivise private property where we can, so that every Dutch citizen can be equally represented in the Netherlands of the future.

name: Close Pillar Institutions
description: It is time we end this pillarised society. Someone who is Protestant will only listen to Protestant radio as it is. Let us end these rifts by closing down the Catholic, Liberal, Protestant and even Socialist news media!

name: National Dutch Broadcaster
description: With the closure of all major broadcasting stations as part of our depillarisation efforts, it is time for us to launch one station for all Dutch, one that represents us all!

name: Doorbraak
description: For too long Holland's political system has been fragmented into clusters of self-serving interest groups and institutions. No more! Finally we shall shatter the obsolete pillars of the past by implementing a new depillarisation programme.

name: Disband the Red Front
description: The Red Front was initially founded to protect the worker against the police in the hands of the capitalists, and later the Landwacht of the VNH. Now that the workers' rights have been secured these unsavoury elements are no longer needed.

name: Brothers All!
description: Everyone in the Netherlands is Dutch, and thus we are brethren - no matter their political allegiances. Let us help each other, one Dutchman to another.

name: VDB-SDAP Coalition
description: The social democrats must work with their partners in the Lijst Links electoral alliance if they are to set up the first Dutch centre-left government.

name: Revoke the Ambtenarenverbod
description: Though perhaps it was suitable for its day, the Ambtenarenverbod has proven itself relatively effective in insulating Dutch politics from extremist. We should abolish it and let civil servants engage with democracy once again.

name: Amend the Wapenwet
description: Currently weapons are quite easily obtainable in the Netherlands, a serious concern in these politically turbulent times. If we were to tighten up our weapons legislation, it would help us limit the casualties of civil violence.

name: Dissolve the Landwacht
description: The paramilitary wing of the VNH is infamous for terrorising peaceful demonstrations, breaking up strikes by force, and allegedly even committing political assassinations! They ought to be banned!

name: Dissolve the Red Front
description: The paramilitary National Red Front is a threat to public order, renowned for its street brawling, persecution of businessmen and supposed violence against the Church! We must outlaw them if we are to get stability!

name: Demand That the Violence Cease
description: In spite of our ban on paramilitaries roaming our streets the violence has only marginally declined. It is time that we invite the leadership of both sides to a meeting to demand their assistance in resolving this crisis.

name: Progressive Tax System
description: We are to tax the rich more than the poor if we are to be able to fund the welfare state we are envisioning and increase equality, even if the rich will not like such a move.

name: State Pensions
description: An essential part of the new Dutch welfare state will be that the elderly will be able to retire with a minimum standard of living, thanks to the contribution of those that continue working.

name: Subsidised Tuition
description: Nothing helps social mobility more than making it possible for those with the capacity to receive the schooling they need. Henceforth the future will determine your fate instead of the past.

name: Sick Leave Legislation
description: Employers should allow people who are not well to stay home for some time, as it is the humane thing to do. Sadly, not everyone seems to agree, so we'll need to make it mandatory.

name: Mandatory Health Insurance
description: Currently healthy people of young age usually do not take health insurance, resulting in very expensive insurance, resulting in some people who need cover being unable to pay for it. We ought to make it mandatory.

name: Doorbraak
description: The pillars are collapsing, and soon the Netherlands will be a true democracy. No longer shall someone vote Catholic just because they are Catholic, they will vote as they feel fit! We must assist this with a process of formal 'depillarisation'.

name: Entice Christian Progressives
description: Many Christian progressives vote for the conservatives simply because they are Christian. Part of the Doorbraak policy will be incentivising them to actually vote for the left-wing parties that they secretly admire.

name: The United State
description: We ought to show unity at all times. Let us stand united as Dutchmen versus the world.

name: Twinkling Social Democracy
description: Our policies have made the Netherlands a beacon in the world, and an example for all on how to build a proper welfare state.
